name: КАНДИДАТ
description: КАНДИДАТ - This is a game where YOU are a presidential candidate, you have to defeat other candidates and get into the top 1 and become president.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) / 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512 MB shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support Storage: 21 MB available space Sound Card: Any
